idea-plugin.name: Th-Td-Finder
idea-plugin.description: TH-TD Finder is a powerful IntelliJ IDEA plugin that enhances your productivity when working with HTML and Twig templates. Say goodbye to scrolling through long, nested tables — TH-TD Finder lets you instantly navigate from a th (table header) to the corresponding td (table data cell), giving you better context and clarity when editing structured markup. Key Features: Smart Navigation – Hover over any th while holding Ctrl (or Cmd on macOS) to instantly highlight and navigate to its associated td cells. Context-Aware – Handles complex table structures and multiple matching cells with an elegant popup selection UI. Twig Support – Perfectly tailored for developers working with Symfony and Twig, or standard HTML templates. Boost Productivity – Spend less time searching, and more time coding with confidence and precision. Whether you're maintaining legacy templates or building complex layouts, TH-TD Finder is your invisible assistant for cleaner, faster front-end development.
